display_information.name: Cooperation Toolkit
display_information.description: Primary interface for the Cooperation Toolkit - manage tasks, COOK, reviews, and governance via Slack
display_information.long_description:
The Cooperation Toolkit Slack bot provides a complete interface for managing your team's work:

• Create and manage tasks
• Track COOK (Contribution Units)
• Handle peer reviews
• Participate in governance
• Receive real-time notifications

All core operations are available via simple Slack commands, making it easy to contribute and collaborate.

slash_commands.description: Primary command for Cooperation Toolkit operations
slash_commands.usage_hint: help | create | list | update | move | task | value | my-cook | assign | review | vote | object
